title: Ticket #4106: Claim reuse broken if slots have user defined resources
description: User defined resources are in 8.0, but not there are missing pieces to the implementation. The SCHEDD doesn't know how to split dynamic slots that have user defined resources. The default WithinResourceLimits expression in the STARTD ignores user-defined resources entirely.
remarks: TimT: Checkin is only a partial fix.
derived_tickets: #6630   Fix schedd's slot splitting to handle custom resources
check_ins: 2013-Dec-06 16:23   Check-in [38950]: fix the default WithinResourceLimits expression to handle user resources. #4106 ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
